LSP MATLAB Server v0.1.0 - Release Notes
Generated: 2026-02-07 03:28:05

Package Contents:
========================================
Source Code (src/)
- MATLAB Parser
- LSP Handlers
- Utilities
- Analyzers
- Feature Management
- Protocol Implementation

Documentation:
========================================
- README.md (Installation Guide)
- INSTALL.md (Detailed Instructions)
- VERSION.md (Version Information)
- CHANGELOG.md (Version History)
- ARCHITECTURE.md (Design Documentation)
- DEVELOPMENT.md (Development Guide)
- TODO.md (Development Tasks - All Completed)

LSP Features:
========================================
- textDocument/completion
- textDocument/hover
- textDocument/documentSymbol
- textDocument/definition
- textDocument/references
- textDocument/codeAction
- workspace/symbol
- textDocument/formatting

Installation:
========================================
1. Navigate to dist/release directory
2. Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt
3. Run server: python run_server.py --stdio

Requirements:
========================================
- Python 3.10 or higher
- 4GB RAM recommended
- Modern IDE with LSP support (VS Code 1.60+, JetBrains 2022+)

For detailed installation instructions, see INSTALL.md

For bug reporting and support, see README.md
